com.smartnsoft.droid4me.bo

Interface Business.InputStreamer<UriType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Business.Cacheable<BusinessObjectType,UriType,ParameterType,ParseExceptionType,StreamerExceptionType,InputExceptionType>, Business.IOStreamer<UriType,ExceptionType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackedWSUriStreamParser.BackedUriStreamedMap, BackedWSUriStreamParser.BackedUriStreamedValue, Business.Cached, Business.ObjectCached, DbPersistence, FilePersistence, NullPersistence, Persistence, WithCacheWSUriStreamParser.CacheableWebUriStreamParser, WithCacheWSUriStreamParser.CachedWebUriStreamParser
    Enclosing class:
    Business

    public static interface Business.InputStreamer<UriType,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable>
    Is able to read an input stream corresponding to a locally cached business object, from a URI, and indicate its last update time stamp.
    Since:
    2009.08.31

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Date getLastUpdate(UriType uri)
      Should return the last modification date of the input stream related to the provided URI.
      Business.InputAtom readInputStream(UriType uri)
      Should return an input stream related to the provided URI.

    • Method Detail

      • readInputStream

        Business.InputAtom readInputStream(UriType uri)
                                   throws ExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable
        Should return an input stream related to the provided URI.
        Parameters:
        uri - an URI which identifies the resource; it is not allowed to be null
        Returns:
        a wrapper of the resulting input stream, which may be null; the Business.InputAtom.inputStream and Business.InputAtom.context are allowed to be null
        Throws:
        ExceptionType - whenever a problem occurred while processing
        ExceptionType extends java.lang.Throwable

      • getLastUpdate

        java.util.Date getLastUpdate(UriType uri)
        Should return the last modification date of the input stream related to the provided URI.
        Parameters:
        uri - an URI which identifies the resource; it is not allowed to be null
        Returns:
        the last modification date of the related input stream, or null if there is no such input stream
